codeFragments.label: service:backend 1
service:backend 2
service:backend 3
codeFragments.content:
var uri = Configuration.GetServiceUri("backend");              
                logger.LogInformation("Backend URL: {BackendUrl}", uri);

codeFragments.label: redis
codeFragments.content:
- name: redis
  image: redis
  bindings:
    - port: 6379
      connectionString: ${host}:${port}

codeFragments.label: postgres
codeFragments.content:
- name: postgres
  image:  postgres
  env:
  - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
    value: "pass@word1"
  bindings:
  - port: 5432
    connectionString: Server=${host};Port=${port};User Id=postgres;Password=${env:POSTGRES_PASSWORD};

codeFragments.label: ingress
codeFragments.content:
ingress:
- name: ingress
  bindings:
    - port: 8080
  rules:
    - path: /
      service: vote
